name: Durandal VN Remastered
description:
A fan-made recreation of Hoyoverse's Durandal Visual Novel, made by Sacron using Ren'py in order to improve the user experience and make an even better translation. Currently it only goes up to chapter 3, but more will be added in the future.

Link for the original VN in Chinese

Link for the original VN in Japanese

Differences to the original game:

  • Minor visual changes
  • New and improved translations
  • Added a button on the bottom left of dialogue boxes to go the previous dialogue. The same can be achieved by moving the scroll wheel up
  • Chapters and cgs will only be unlocked after seeing them once
  • Downloadable persistent file to unlock the current cgs and chapters, as the above mentioned change can be unpopular
  • Clicky buttons!
